mainText.attr1: Void Destroyer has several ways of controlling ships. Direct flight, targeting, issuing orders. Another method of control is setting how ships acquire targets on their own - described in this topic.
You can specify overall ship behavior
How/when ships acquire targets on their own
You can still issue go to or attack orders
Ships will (nearly) always obey your orders
Select a friendly ship or ship - select from three choices
You can override ships weapons use, see Weapons Hold topic for more details.
Ships inherit these settings from their formation leader. See Inheritance topic below for more details.
